comments.body: Did this test begin to fail? As above, I don't think this is the right suite to test the ca.crt configmap publisher. It doesn't roll up to the right owners if this suite starts to fail. Something in sig-auth would be better.
why is the same SIGDescribe used here too? And the same BeforeEach?  Couldn't this be another `It` under the 1st SIGDescribe?

This is for alpha feature and will skip if local ephemeral storage feature is not enabled in BeforeEach.
As i said before, will merge it when the feature graduates to beta or GA
